org.apache.http.conn.ClientConnectionRequest

    org.apache.http.impl.conn.tsccm
    Deprecated.

    • Uses of ClientConnectionRequest in org.apache.http.client.methods

      Deprecated. 
      void AbortableHttpRequest.setConnectionRequest(ClientConnectionRequest connRequest)
      Deprecated. 
      Sets the ClientConnectionRequest callback that can be used to abort a long-lived request for a connection.

    • Uses of ClientConnectionRequest in org.apache.http.conn

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientConnectionRequest ClientConnectionManager.requestConnection(HttpRoute route, Object state)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a new ClientConnectionRequest, from which a ManagedClientConnection can be obtained or the request can be aborted.
